title: My Club disappeared along with my Clan tag
body:
I created a club and my friends are in it with me, (Im the leader of the club) and a while back my club just randomly disappeared and the tag. For some reason though im still in the club on my friends account...
if you know of a fix please let me know its sorta bugging me alot

Club: The Gungle Book
Tag: LTGB
IGN: CaptainFrelixx
Thanks

replies.body: There was an issue like this a while back, but should be resolved now.  I looked into your club specifically and gave it a boop just in case.  Let me know if this is a still an issue after relogging!
